page.title: 13Pershore Carnival
page.content:
Pershore Carnival
Every Bank Holiday 25th May Pershore has a Carnival.We have different kinds of floats of different scenes.Our School did a float and we did Alice In Wonderland.We go on the route down the High Street and round.Usually people throw money on the floats for charity.When the floats are going round people stand in crowds along the sides of the roads and shout and throw money onto the floats.When we have gone all the way round the judges pick the winning floats.The people from the winning floats go down onto the Abbey field where the swings are and collect their prizes and cups. Affter the Carnival there usually is a fair so the children have a good time. The winning float of the whole Carnival wins Â£50. for themselves.
